00031 class XMultipole : public QMCalculator

00063 
00064     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00065     // Multipole Interaction Class //
00066     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00067 
00068     class XInteractor
00069     {
00070     public:
00071 
00072         XInteractor(Topology *top, XMultipole *em) : _top(top), _em(em) {};
00073         XInteractor() : _top(NULL), _em(NULL) {};
00074        ~XInteractor() {};
00075 
00076         // UNITS IN INPUT FILES
00077         // ... Always use atomic units
00078         // ... ... Positions in a0 (bohr)
00079         // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(a0)**k
00080         // ... ... Dipole polarizability in A³ (Angstrom cubed)
00081 
00082         // UNITS USED INTERNALLY
00083         // ... Use nm instead of a0 and A
00084         // ... ... Positions in nm
00085         // ... ... Multipole moment of rank k in e(nm)**k
00086         // ... ... Dipole polarizability in nm³
00087 
00088         // CONVERSION FACTORS
00089         // ... Electric field (N/C) = Electric field (int)
00090         //                          * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+18
00091         // ... Energy (eV) = Energy (int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+09
00092         //
00093         // ... Potential (V) = Potential(int) * 1/4PiEps0(SI) * e * 1e+0.9
00094 
00095 
00096         inline double EnergyInter(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00097         inline double EnergyInterESP(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00098         inline double EnergyIntra(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00099         inline void FieldPerm(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00100         inline vec  FieldPermESF(vec r, PolarSite &pol);
00101         inline void FieldIndu(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00102         inline void FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1, PolarSite &pol2);
00103 
00104         inline double PotentialPerm(vec r, PolarSite &pol);
00105 
00106         void ResetEnergy() { EP = EU_INTER = EU_INTRA = 0.0; }
00107         double &getEP() { return EP; }
00108         double &getEU_INTER() { return EU_INTER; }
00109         double &getEU_INTRA() { return EU_INTRA; }
00110 
00111     private:
00112 
00113         double EP;       //   <- Interaction permanent multipoles (inter-site)
00114         double EU_INTRA; //   <- Interaction induction multipoles (intra-site)
00115         double EU_INTER; //   <- Interaction induction multipoles (inter-site)
00116 
00117 
00118         vec    e12;     //  |
00119         double u3;      //  |-> NOTE: Only needed when using Thole model
00120         double a;       //  |         (do not forget to init. though...)
00121 
00122         double R;       //  |
00123         double R2;      //  |
00124         double R3;      //  |-> NOTE: reciprocal, i.e. e.g. R3 = 1/(R*R*R)
00125         double R4;      //  |
00126         double R5;      //  |
00127 
00128         double rax, ray, raz;
00129         double rbx, rby, rbz;
00130         double cxx, cxy, cxz;
00131         double cyx, cyy, cyz;
00132         double czx, czy, czz;
00133 
00134         inline double lambda3() { return 1 - exp( -a*u3); }
00135         inline double lambda5() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3) * exp( -a*u3); }
00136         inline double lambda7() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3 + 0.6*a*a*u3*u3) * exp( -a*u3); }
00137         inline double lambda9() { return 1 - (1 + a*u3 + (18*a*a*u3*u3 + 9*a*a*a*u3*u3*u3)/35) * exp( -a*u3); }
00138 
00139         inline double T00_00() { return R; }
00140 
00141         inline double T1x_00() { return R2 * rax; }
00142         inline double T1y_00() { return R2 * ray; }
00143         inline double T1z_00() { return R2 * raz; }
00144         inline double T00_1x() { return R2 * rbx; }
00145         inline double T00_1y() { return R2 * rby; }
00146         inline double T00_1z() { return R2 * rbz; }
00147 
00148         inline double TU1x_00() { return lambda3() * R2 * rax; }
00149         inline double TU1y_00() { return lambda3() * R2 * ray; }
00150         inline double TU1z_00() { return lambda3() * R2 * raz; }
00151         inline double TU00_1x() { return lambda3() * R2 * rbx; }
00152         inline double TU00_1y() { return lambda3() * R2 * rby; }
00153         inline double TU00_1z() { return lambda3() * R2 * rbz; }
00154 
00155         inline double T20_00()  { return R3 * 0.5 * (3 * raz*raz - 1); }
00156         inline double T21c_00() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rax * raz; }
00157         inline double T21s_00() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * ray * raz; }
00158         inline double T22c_00() { return R3 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (rax*rax - ray*ray); }
00159         inline double T22s_00() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rax*ray; }
00160         inline double T00_20()  { return R3 * 0.5 * (3 * rbz*rbz - 1); }
00161         inline double T00_21c() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rbx * rbz; }
00162         inline double T00_21s() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rby * rbz; }
00163         inline double T00_22c() { return R3 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (rbx*rbx - rby*rby); }
00164         inline double T00_22s() { return R3 * sqrt(3) * rbx*rby; }
00165 
00166         inline double T1x_1x() { return R3 * (3 * rax*rbx + cxx); }
00167         inline double T1x_1y() { return R3 * (3 * rax*rby + cxy); }
00168         inline double T1x_1z() { return R3 * (3 * rax*rbz + cxz); }
00169         inline double T1y_1x() { return R3 * (3 * ray*rbx + cyx); }
00170         inline double T1y_1y() { return R3 * (3 * ray*rby + cyy); }
00171         inline double T1y_1z() { return R3 * (3 * ray*rbz + cyz); }
00172         inline double T1z_1x() { return R3 * (3 * raz*rbx + czx); }
00173         inline double T1z_1y() { return R3 * (3 * raz*rby + czy); }
00174         inline double T1z_1z() { return R3 * (3 * raz*rbz + czz); }
00175 
00176         inline double TU1x_1x() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*rax*rbx + lambda3()*cxx); }
00177         inline double TU1x_1y() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*rax*rby + lambda3()*cxy); }
00178         inline double TU1x_1z() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*rax*rbz + lambda3()*cxz); }
00179         inline double TU1y_1x() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*ray*rbx + lambda3()*cyx); }
00180         inline double TU1y_1y() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*ray*rby + lambda3()*cyy); }
00181         inline double TU1y_1z() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*ray*rbz + lambda3()*cyz); }
00182         inline double TU1z_1x() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*raz*rbx + lambda3()*czx); }
00183         inline double TU1z_1y() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*raz*rby + lambda3()*czy); }
00184         inline double TU1z_1z() { return R3 * (lambda5()*3*raz*rbz + lambda3()*czz); }

00186         inline double T20_1x()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*raz*raz*rbx + 6*raz*czx - 3*rbx); }
00187         inline double T20_1y()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*raz*raz*rby + 6*raz*czy - 3*rby); }
00188         inline double T20_1z()  { return R4 * 0.5 * (15*raz*raz*rbz + 6*raz*czz - 3*rbz); }
00189         inline double T21c_1x() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (rax*czx + cxx*raz + 5*rax*raz*rbx); }
00190         inline double T21c_1y() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (rax*czy + cxy*raz + 5*rax*raz*rby); }
00191         inline double T21c_1z() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (rax*czz + cxz*raz + 5*rax*raz*rbz); }
00192         inline double T21s_1x() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (ray*czx + cyx*raz + 5*ray*raz*rbx); }
00193         inline double T21s_1y() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (ray*czy + cyy*raz + 5*ray*raz*rby); }
00194         inline double T21s_1z() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * (ray*czz + cyz*raz + 5*ray*raz*rbz); }
00195         inline double T22c_1x() { return R4 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*(rax*rax-ray*ray)*rbx + 2*rax*cxx - 2*ray*cyx); }
00196         inline double T22c_1y() { return R4 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*(rax*rax-ray*ray)*rby + 2*rax*cxy - 2*ray*cyy); }
00197         inline double T22c_1z() { return R4 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*(rax*rax-ray*ray)*rbz + 2*rax*cxz - 2*ray*cyz); }
00198         inline double T22s_1x() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*rax*ray*rbx + rax*cyx + ray*cxx ); }
00199         inline double T22s_1y() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*rax*ray*rby + rax*cyy + ray*cxy ); }
00200         inline double T22s_1z() { return R4 * sqrt(3) * ( 5*rax*ray*rbz + rax*cyz + ray*cxz ); }

00267         inline double T21s_20()  { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*ray*raz - 5*ray*raz + 10*rbz*ray*czz + 10*rbz*raz*cyz + 2*cyz*czz); }
00268         inline double T22c_20()  { return R5 * 0.25 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rbz*rbz*ray*ray - 5*rax*rax + 5*ray*ray + 20*rbz*rax*cxz - 20*rbz*ray*cyz + 2*cxz*cxz - 2*cyz*cyz); }
00269         inline double T22s_20()  { return R5 * 0.5 * sqrt(3) * (35*rbz*rbz*rax*ray - 5*rax*ray + 10*rbz*rax*cyz + 10*rbz*ray*cxz + 2*cxz*cyz); }
00270         inline double T21s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*ray*raz + 5*rbx*ray*czz + 5*rbx*raz*cyz + 5*rbz*ray*czx + 5*rbz*raz*cyx + cyx*czz + czx*cyz); }
00271         inline double T22c_21c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rbx*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cxz - 10*rbx*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxx - 10*rbz*ray*cyx + 2*cxx*cxz - 2*cyx*cyz); }
00272         inline double T22s_21c() { return R5 * (35*rbx*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rbx*rax*cyz + 5*rbx*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyx + 5*rbz*ray*cxx + cxx*cyz + cyx*cxz); }
00273         inline double T22c_21s() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*rax - 35*rby*rbz*ray*ray + 10*rby*rax*cxz - 10*rby*ray*cyz + 10*rbz*rax*cxy - 10*rbz*ray*cyy + 2*cxy*cxz - 2*cyy*cyz); }
00274         inline double T22s_21s() { return R5 * (35*rby*rbz*rax*ray + 5*rby*rax*cyz + 5*rby*ray*cxz + 5*rbz*rax*cyy + 5*rbz*ray*cxy + cxy*cyz + cyy*cxz); }
00275         inline double T22s_22c() { return R5 * 0.5 * (35*rbx*rbx*rax*ray - 35*rby*rby*rax*ray + 10*rbx*rax*cyx + 10*rbx*ray*cxx - 10*rby*rax*cyy - 10*rby*ray*cxy + 2*cxx*cyx - 2*cxy*cyy); }
00276 
00277         Topology        *_top;
00278         XMultipole     *_em;
00279 
00280     };
00281 
00282 
00283     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00284     // Site workers (i.e. individual threads) //
00285     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00286 
00287     class SiteOpMultipole : public Thread
00288     {
00289     public:
00290 
00291         SiteOpMultipole(int id, Topology *top,
00292                      XMultipole *master)
00293                    : _id(id), _top(top), _seg(NULL),
00294                      _master(master)
00295                    { _actor = XInteractor(top,_master); };
00296 
00297        ~SiteOpMultipole();
00298 
00299         int  getId() { return _id; }
00300         void setId(int id) { _id = id; }
00301 
00302         void InitSlotData(Topology *top);
00303         void Run(void);
00304 
00305         void   EvalSite(Topology *top, Segment *seg);
00306         void   Charge(int state);
00307         int    Induce(int state);
00308         double Energy(int state);
00309         double EnergyStatic(int state);
00310         void   Depolarize();
00311 
00312 
00313     public:
00314 
00315         int                           _id;
00316         Topology                     *_top;
00317         Segment                      *_seg;
00318         XMultipole                  *_master;
00319 
00320         vector< Segment* >           _segsPolSphere; // Segments    in c/o 0-1
00321         vector< Segment* >           _segsOutSphere; // Segments    in c/0 1-2
00322         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polsPolSphere; // Polar sites in c/o 0-1
00323         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polsOutSphere; // Polar sites in c/o 1-2
00324         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > _polarSites;    // Copy of top polar sites
00325         XInteractor                   _actor;
00326     };
00327 
00328 
00329 private:
00330 
00331     // Allocation of polar sites to fragments and segments
00332     map<string, vector<PolarSite*> >     _map_seg_polarSites;
00333     map<string, vector<bool> >           _map_seg_chrgStates;
00334     map<string, vector<int> >            _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00335     map<string, vector<string> >         _alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00336     map<string, bool>                    _map2md;
00337 
00338     // Thread management
00339     vector<Segment*> ::iterator _nextSite;
00340     Mutex                       _nextSiteMutex;
00341     Mutex                       _coutMutex;
00342     Mutex                       _logMutex;
00343     bool                        _maverick;
00344 
00345     // Control options
00346     bool            _induce;
00347     int             _firstSeg;
00348     int             _lastSeg;
00349     string          _checkPolesPDB;
00350 
00351     // Logging
00352     string          _outFile;
00353     bool            _energies2File;
00354     map<int,vector<int> > _log_seg_iter;
00355     map<int,int>    _log_seg_sphereSize;
00356     map<int,vec>    _log_seg_com;
00357 
00358     // Interaction parameters
00359     bool            _useCutoff;
00360     double          _cutoff;
00361     double          _cutoff2;
00362     bool            _useExp;
00363     double          _aDamp;
00364     bool            _useScaling;
00365     vector<double>  _scale1;
00366 
00367     // Convergence parameters
00368     float           _wSOR_N;
00369     float           _wSOR_C;
00370     double          _epsTol;
00371     int             _maxIter;
00372 
00373 };
00374 
00375 
00382 void XMultipole::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00383 
00384     cout << endl << "... ... Initialize with " << _nThreads << " threads.";
00385     _maverick = (_nThreads == 1) ? true : false;
00386 
00387     cout << endl <<  "... ... Parametrizing Thole model";
00388 
00389     string key;
00390     string xmlfile;
00391 
00392     /* ---- OPTIONS.XML Structure ----
00393      * <XMultipole>
00394      *
00395      *      <multipoles></multipoles>
00396      *
00397      *      <control>
00398      *          <induce></induce>
00399      *          <first></first>
00400      *          <last></last>
00401      *          <output></output>
00402      *          <check></check>
00403      *      </control>
00404      *
00405      *      <esp>
00406      *          <calcESP></calcESP>
00407      *          <doSystem></doSystem>
00408      *          <cube></cube>
00409      *          <output></output>
00410      *      <esp>
00411      *
00412      *      <esf>
00413      *          <calcESF></calcESF>
00414      *          <grid></grid>
00415      *          <output></output>
00416      *      <esf>
00417      *
00418      *      <alphamol>
00419      *          <calcAlpha></calcAlpha>
00420      *          <doSystem></doSystem>
00421      *          <output></output>
00422      *      </alphamol>
00423      *
00424      *      <tholeparam>
00425      *          <cutoff></cutoff>
00426      *          <cutoff2></cutoff2>
00427      *          <expdamp></expdamp>
00428      *          <scaling></scaling>
00429      *      </tholeparam>
00430      *
00431      *      <convparam>
00432      *          <wSOR_N></wSOR_N>
00433      *          <wSOR_C></wSOR_C>
00434      *          <maxiter></maxiter>
00435      *          <tolerance></tolerance>
00436      *          <log></log>
00437      *      </convparam>
00438      */
00439 
00440     key = "options.XMultipole.multipoles";
00441 
00442         if ( opt->exists(key) ) {
00443             xmlfile = opt->get(key).as< string >();
00444         }
00445 
00446     key = "options.XMultipole.control";
00447 
00448         if ( opt->exists(key+".induce") ) {
00449             int induce = opt->get(key+".induce").as< int >();
00450             _induce = (induce == 0) ? false : true;
00451         }
00452         else { _induce = true; }
00453 
00454         if ( opt->exists(key+".first") ) {
00455             _firstSeg = opt->get(key+".first").as< int >();
00456         }
00457         else { _firstSeg = 1; }
00458 
00459         if ( opt->exists(key+".last") ) {
00460             _lastSeg = opt->get(key+".last").as< int >();
00461         }
00462         else { _lastSeg = -1; }
00463 
00464         if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
00465             _outFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00466             _energies2File = true;
00467         }
00468         else { _energies2File = false; }
00469 
00470         if ( opt->exists(key+".check") ) {
00471             _checkPolesPDB = opt->get(key+".check").as< string >();
00472         }
00473         else { _checkPolesPDB = ""; }
00474 
00475     key = "options.XMultipole.esp";
00476 
00477         if ( opt->exists(key+".calcESP") ) {
00478             int calcESP = opt->get(key+".calcESP").as< int >();
00479             _calcESP = (calcESP == 0) ? false : true;
00480         }
00481         else {
00482             _calcESP = false;
00483         }
00484         if (_calcESP) {
00485             _espCubeFile = opt->get(key+".cube").as< string >();
00486             _espOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00487             if (opt->exists(key+".doSystem")) {
00488                 int doSystem = opt->get(key+".doSystem").as< int >();
00489                 _ESPdoSystem = (doSystem == 0) ? false : true;
00490             }
00491             else { _ESPdoSystem = false; }
00492         }
00493 
00494     key = "options.XMultipole.esf";
00495 
00496         if ( opt->exists(key+".calcESF") ) {
00497             int calcESF = opt->get(key+".calcESF").as< int >();
00498             _calcESF = (calcESF == 0) ? false : true;
00499         }
00500         else {
00501             _calcESF = false;
00502         }
00503         if (_calcESF) {
00504             _esfGridFile = opt->get(key+".grid").as< string >();
00505             _esfOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00506         }
00507 
00508     key = "options.XMultipole.alphamol";
00509 
00510         if ( opt->exists(key+".calcAlpha") ) {
00511             int calcAlpha = opt->get(key+".calcAlpha").as< int >();
00512             _calcAlphaMol = (calcAlpha == 0) ? false : true;
00513         }
00514         if ( opt->exists(key+".doSystem") ) {
00515             int doSystem = opt->get(key+".doSystem").as< int >();
00516             _doSystem = (doSystem == 0) ? false : true;
00517         }
00518         else {
00519             _doSystem = false;
00520         }
00521         if ( opt->exists(key+".output") ) {
00522             string alphaOutFile = opt->get(key+".output").as< string >();
00523             _alphaOutFile = alphaOutFile;
00524         }
00525         else {
00526             _alphaOutFile = "nofile";
00527         }
00528 
00529     key = "options.XMultipole.tholeparam";
00530 
00531         if ( opt->exists(key+".cutoff") ) {
00532             _cutoff = opt->get(key+".cutoff").as< double >();
00533             if (_cutoff) { _useCutoff = true; }
00534         }
00535         if ( opt->exists(key+".cutoff2") ) {
00536             _cutoff2 = opt->get(key+".cutoff2").as< double >();
00537         }
00538         else {
00539             _cutoff2 = _cutoff;
00540         }
00541         if ( opt->exists(key+".expdamp") ) {
00542             _aDamp = opt->get(key+".expdamp").as< double >();
00543             if (_aDamp) { _useExp = true; }
00544         }
00545          if ( opt->exists(key+".scaling") ) {
00546             _scale1 = opt->get(key+".scaling").as< vector<double> >();
00547             if (0 < _scale1.size() && _scale1.size() < 4) {
00548                 _useScaling = true; }
00549             else {
00550                 _useScaling = false;
00551                 cout << endl << "... ... WARNING: 1-N SCALING SWITCHED OFF"; }
00552         }
00553 
00554     key = "options.XMultipole.convparam";
00555 
00556         if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_N") ) {
00557             _wSOR_N = opt->get(key+".wSOR_N").as< float >();
00558         }
00559         else { _wSOR_N = 0.75; }
00560         if ( opt->exists(key+".wSOR_C") ) {
00561             _wSOR_C = opt->get(key+".wSOR_C").as< float >();
00562         }
00563         else { _wSOR_C = 0.75; }
00564 
00565         if ( opt->exists(key+".maxiter") ) {
00566             _maxIter = opt->get(key+".maxiter").as< int >();
00567         }
00568         else { _maxIter = 512; }
00569 
00570         if ( opt->exists(key+".tolerance") ) {
00571             _epsTol = opt->get(key+".tolerance").as< double >();
00572         }
00573         else { _epsTol = 0.001; }
00574 
00575     if (!top->isEStatified()) { this->EStatify(top, opt); }
00576 
00577     if (_calcESP && (!_ESPdoSystem))      { this->CalculateESPInput(top); }
00578     if (this->_calcESF)                   { this->CalculateESF(top); }
00579     if (this->_calcAlphaMol)              { this->CalculateAlphaInput(top); }
00580 }
00581 
00582 
00589 void XMultipole::EStatify(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00590 
00591     cout << endl << "... ... Estatify system: ";
00592 
00593     string key = "options.XMultipole";
00594     string allocFile = options->get(key+".multipoles").as<string> ();
00595 
00596     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00597     // Load polar-site indices from XML //
00598     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00599 
00600     // => Output to maps:
00601     map<string, vector<int> > alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00602     map<string, vector<string> > alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00603     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n;
00604     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e;
00605     map<string, string > alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h;
00606 
00607     Property allocation; // <- Which polar sites are part of which fragment?
00608     load_property_from_xml(allocation, allocFile.c_str());
00609 
00610 
00611     /* --- MULTIPOLES.XML Structure ---
00612      *
00613      * <topology>
00614      *
00615      *     <molecules>
00616      *          <molecule>
00617      *          <name></name>
00618      *
00619      *          <segments>
00620      *
00621      *              <segment>
00622      *              <name>DCV</name>
00623      *
00624      *              <multipoles_n></multipoles_n>
00625      *              <multipoles_e></multipoles_e>
00626      *              <multipoles_h></multipoles_h>
00627      *
00628      *              <map2md></map2md>
00629      *
00630      *              <fragments>
00631      *                  <fragment>
00632      *                  <name></name>
00633      *                  <mpoles></mpoles>
00634      *                  </fragment>
00635      *              </fragments>
00636      *              ...
00637      *              ...
00638      */
00639 
00640 
00641     key = "topology.molecules.molecule";
00642     list<Property *> mols = allocation.Select(key);
00643     list<Property *>::iterator molit;
00644     for (molit = mols.begin(); molit != mols.end(); molit++) {
00645 
00646         string molName = (*molit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00647 
00648         key = "segments.segment";
00649         list<Property *> segs = (*molit)->Select(key);
00650         list<Property *>::iterator segit;
00651 
00652         for (segit = segs.begin(); segit != segs.end(); segit++) {
00653 
00654             string segName = (*segit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00655 
00656             // GDMA filenames for cation (h), neutral (n), anion (e) state
00657             string mpoleFile_n = (*segit)->get("multipoles_n").as<string> ();
00658             alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n[segName] = mpoleFile_n;
00659             if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_e")) {
00660                 string mpoleFile_e = (*segit)->get("multipoles_e").as<string>();
00661                 alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e[segName] = mpoleFile_e;
00662             }
00663             if ( (*segit)->exists("multipoles_h")) {
00664                 string mpoleFile_h = (*segit)->get("multipoles_h").as<string>();
00665                 alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h[segName] = mpoleFile_h;
00666             }
00667 
00668             // Default: Project multipoles onto rigidified coordinates
00669             if ( (*segit)->exists("map2md")) {
00670                 int map2md = (*segit)->get("map2md").as<int>();
00671                 _map2md[segName] = (map2md == 0) ? false : true;
00672             }
00673             else {
00674                 _map2md[segName] = false; // i.e. map to rigidified coordinates
00675             }
00676 
00677             key = "fragments.fragment";
00678             list<Property *> frags = (*segit)->Select(key);
00679             list<Property *>::iterator fragit;
00680 
00681             for (fragit = frags.begin(); fragit != frags.end(); fragit++) {
00682 
00683                 string fragName = (*fragit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00684                 string mapKeyName = fragName + segName + molName;
00685 
00686                 string mpoles = (*fragit)->get("mpoles").as<string> ();
00687 
00688                 Tokenizer tokPoles(mpoles, " \t\n");
00689                 vector<string> mpoleInfo;
00690                 tokPoles.ToVector(mpoleInfo);
00691 
00692                 vector<int> mpoleIdcs;
00693                 vector<string> mpoleNames;
00694 
00695                 vector<string> ::iterator strit;
00696                 for (strit=mpoleInfo.begin(); strit<mpoleInfo.end(); strit++) {
00697 
00698                     Tokenizer tokPoleInfo( (*strit), " :");
00699                     vector<string> poleInfo;
00700                     tokPoleInfo.ToVector(poleInfo);
00701 
00702                     int mpoleIdx = boost::lexical_cast<int>(poleInfo[0]);
00703                     string mpoleName = poleInfo[1];
00704 
00705                     mpoleIdcs.push_back(mpoleIdx);
00706                     mpoleNames.push_back(mpoleName);
00707 
00708                 }
00709 
00710                 alloc_frag_mpoleIdx[mapKeyName] = mpoleIdcs;
00711                 alloc_frag_mpoleName[mapKeyName] = mpoleNames;
00712             }
00713         }
00714     }
00715 
00716     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00717     // Parse GDMA punch files //
00718     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00719 
00720     // => Output to PolarSite Container (template container)
00721     map<string, vector<PolarSite*> > map_seg_polarSites;
00722     map<string, vector<bool> >       map_seg_chrgStates;
00723 
00724 
00725     // Multipoles for neutral state
00726     int state = 0;
00727     map<string, string > ::iterator strit;
00728     for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.begin();
00729          strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_n.end();
00730          strit++) {
00731 
00732         string segName = strit->first;
00733         string filename = strit->second;
00734 
00735         vector< PolarSite* > poles = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00736 
00737         map_seg_polarSites[segName] = poles;
00738         map_seg_chrgStates[segName].resize(3);
00739         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][0] = false; // <- negative
00740         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][1] = true;  // <- neutral
00741         map_seg_chrgStates[segName][2] = false; // <- positive
00742         poles.clear();
00743 
00744     }
00745 
00746     // Multipoles for negative state
00747     state = -1;
00748     if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.size() ) {
00749         for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.begin();
00750              strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_e.end();
00751              strit++) {
00752             string segName = strit->first;
00753             string filename = strit->second;
00754 
00755             vector< PolarSite* > polesAnion = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00756             map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
00757 
00758             // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
00759             vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];
00760 
00761             assert(polesAnion.size() == polesNeutral.size());
00762             for (int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
00763 
00764                 polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesAnion[i]->getQs(state), state );
00765                 polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesAnion[i]->getPs(state), state );
00766                 delete polesAnion[i];
00767             }
00768             polesAnion.clear();
00769         }
00770     }
00771 
00772     // Multipoles for positive state
00773     state = +1;
00774     if ( alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.size() ) {
00775         for (strit = alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.begin();
00776              strit != alloc_seg_mpoleFiles_h.end();
00777              strit++) {
00778             string segName = strit->first;
00779             string filename = strit->second;
00780 
00781             vector< PolarSite* > polesCation = ParseGdmaFile(filename, state);
00782             map_seg_chrgStates[segName][state+1] = true;
00783 
00784             // Merge with polar sites for neutral state
00785             vector< PolarSite* > polesNeutral = map_seg_polarSites[segName];
00786 
00787             assert(polesCation.size() == polesNeutral.size());
00788             for (int i = 0; i < polesNeutral.size(); i++) {
00789 
00790                 polesNeutral[i]->setQs( polesCation[i]->getQs(state), state );
00791                 polesNeutral[i]->setPs( polesCation[i]->getPs(state), state );
00792                 delete polesCation[i];
00793             }
00794             polesCation.clear();
00795         }
00796     }
00797 
00798     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00799     // Forward information on polar-site templates to topology //
00800     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00801 
00802     // Containers to use for mapping
00803     // map<string, vector<PolarSite*> >     map_seg_polarSites;
00804     // map<string, vector<int> >            alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00805     // map<string, vector<string> >         alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00806 
00807     // TO CONTINUE FROM HERE ...
00808     // Loop over segments, loop over fragments in segments.
00809     // => For each segment, look up associated polar sites using map 1;
00810     //      => For each fragment, look up associated
00811     //         polar sites idcs. using map 2;
00812     //          => For each index in retrieved container, create new polar site,
00813     //             importing information from polar site container of segment
00814     //          => Translate positions to MD frame, copy local frame from
00815     //             fragment
00816 
00817     _map_seg_polarSites = map_seg_polarSites;
00818     _map_seg_chrgStates = map_seg_chrgStates;
00819     _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx =  alloc_frag_mpoleIdx;
00820     _alloc_frag_mpoleName = alloc_frag_mpoleName;
00821 
00822 }
00823 
00824 
00832 vector<PolarSite*> XMultipole::ParseGdmaFile(string filename, int state) {
00833 
00834     int poleCount = 1;
00835     double Q0_total = 0.0;
00836     string units = "";
00837     bool useDefaultPs = true;
00838 
00839     vector<PolarSite*> poles;
00840     PolarSite *thisPole = NULL;
00841 
00842     vector<double> Qs; // <- multipole moments
00843     double         P1; // <- dipole polarizability
00844 
00845     std::string line;
00846     std::ifstream intt;
00847     intt.open(filename.c_str());
00848 
00849     if (intt.is_open() ) {
00850         while ( intt.good() ) {
00851 
00852             std::getline(intt, line);
00853             vector<string> split;
00854             Tokenizer toker(line, " ");
00855             toker.ToVector(split);
00856 
00857             if ( !split.size()      ||
00858                   split[0] == "!"   ||
00859                   split[0].substr(0,1) == "!" ) { continue; }
00860 
00861     // ! Interesting information here, e.g.
00862     // ! DCV2T opt
00863     // ! SP        RB3LYP          6-311+G(d,p)
00864     // Units bohr
00865     //
00866     // C          -4.2414603400   -3.8124751600    0.0017575736    Rank  2
00867     //  -0.3853409355
00868     //  -0.0002321905   0.2401559510   0.6602334308
00869     //  -0.7220625314   0.0004894995  -0.0003833545   0.4526409813  -0.50937399
00870     //  P 1.75
00871 
00872 
00873             // Units used
00874             if ( split[0] == "Units") {
00875                 units = split[1];
00876                 if (units != "bohr" && units != "angstrom") {
00877                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
00878                                             + filename + " not supported.");
00879                 }
00880             }
00881 
00882             // element,  position,  rank limit
00883             else if ( split.size() == 6 ) {
00884 
00885                 Qs.clear();
00886                 P1 = -1.;
00887 
00888                 int id = poleCount++;  // <- starts from 1
00889                 string name = split[0];
00890 
00891                 double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
00892                 double ANGSTROM2NM = 0.1;
00893                 double x, y, z;
00894 
00895                 if (units == "bohr") {
00896                     x = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00897                     y = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
00898                     z = BOHR2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00899                 }
00900                 else if (units == "angstrom") {
00901                     x = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00902                     y = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[2]);
00903                     z = ANGSTROM2NM * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[3]);
00904                 }
00905                 else {
00906                     throw std::runtime_error( "Unit " + units + " in file "
00907                                             + filename + " not supported.");
00908                 }
00909 
00910                 vec pos = vec(x,y,z);
00911 
00912                 int rank = boost::lexical_cast<int>(split[5]);
00913 
00914                 PolarSite *newPole = new PolarSite(id, name);
00915                 newPole->setRank(rank);
00916                 newPole->setPos(pos);
00917                 poles.push_back(newPole);
00918                 thisPole = newPole;
00919 
00920             }
00921 
00922             // 'P', dipole polarizability
00923             else if ( split[0] == "P" && split.size() == 2 ) {
00924                 P1 = 1e-3 * boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[1]);
00925                 thisPole->setPs(P1, state);
00926                 useDefaultPs = false;
00927             }
00928 
00929             // multipole line
00930             else {
00931 
00932                 int lineRank = int( sqrt(thisPole->getQs(state).size()) + 0.5 );
00933 
00934                 if (lineRank == 0) {
00935                     Q0_total += boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[0]);
00936                 }
00937 
00938                 for (int i = 0; i < split.size(); i++) {
00939 
00940                     double qXYZ = boost::lexical_cast<double>(split[i]);
00941 
00942                     // Convert e*(a_0)^k to e*(nm)^k where k = rank
00943                     double BOHR2NM = 0.0529189379;
00944                     qXYZ *= pow(BOHR2NM, lineRank); // OVERRIDE
00945 
00946                     Qs.push_back(qXYZ);
00947 
00948                 }
00949                 thisPole->setQs(Qs, state);
00950             }
00951 
00952         } /* Exit loop over lines */
00953     }
00954     else { cout << endl << "ERROR: No such file " << filename << endl; }
00955 
00956     cout << endl << "... ... ... Reading " << filename <<
00957                     ": Q0(Total) = " << Q0_total << flush;
00958 
00959     if (useDefaultPs) {
00960 
00961         cout << endl << "... ... ... NOTE Using default Thole polarizabilities "
00962              << "for charge state " << state << ". ";
00963 
00964         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pol;
00965         for (pol = poles.begin(); pol < poles.end(); ++pol) {
00966             string elem = (*pol)->getName();
00967             double alpha = 0.0;
00968             // Original set of Thole polarizabilites
00969             if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.75e-3;  } // <- conversion from
00970             else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.696e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
00971             else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
00972             else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
00973             else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 2.926e-3; }
00974             // Different set of Thole polarizabilities
00975             //if      (elem == "C") { alpha = 1.334e-3; } // <- conversion from
00976             //else if (elem == "H") { alpha = 0.496e-3; } //    A³ to nm³ = 10⁻³
00977             //else if (elem == "N") { alpha = 1.073e-3; }
00978             //else if (elem == "O") { alpha = 0.837e-3; }
00979             //else if (elem == "S") { alpha = 3.300e-3; }
00980             else { throw runtime_error("No polarizability given "
00981                                        "for polar site type " + elem + ". "); }
00982             (*pol)->setPs(alpha, state);
00983         }
00984     }
00985 
00986     return poles;
00987 
00988 }
00989 
00990 
00991 
00998 void XMultipole::DistributeMpoles(Topology *top) {
00999 
01000     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01001     // Equip TOP with distributed multipoles //
01002     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01003 
01004     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
01005     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
01006          sit < top->Segments().end();
01007          ++sit) {
01008 
01009         Segment *seg = *sit;
01010         vector<PolarSite*> poleSites = _map_seg_polarSites.at(seg->getName());
01011         seg->setChrgStates(_map_seg_chrgStates[seg->getName()]);
01012 
01013         bool map2md = _map2md[seg->getName()];
01014 
01015         vector<Fragment*> ::iterator fit;
01016         for (fit = seg->Fragments().begin();
01017              fit < seg->Fragments().end();
01018              ++fit) {
01019 
01020             Fragment *frag = *fit;
01021 
01022             string idkey = frag->getName() + seg->getName()
01023                          + seg->getMolecule()->getName();
01024             vector<int> polesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleIdx.at(idkey);
01025             vector<string> namesInFrag = _alloc_frag_mpoleName.at(idkey);
01026 
01027             if (map2md) {
01028                 if (polesInFrag.size() != frag->Atoms().size()) {
01029                     cout << endl << "ERROR: Segment " << seg->getName() <<
01030                             " Fragment " << frag->getName() <<
01031                             ": MAP2MD = TRUE requires same number of polar sites "
01032                             " as there are atoms to perform mapping. " << endl;
01033                     throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
01034                 }
01035             }
01036 
01037 
01038             for (int i = 0; i < polesInFrag.size(); i++) {
01039 
01040                 string name = namesInFrag[i];
01041                 int poleId = polesInFrag[i];
01042 
01043                 PolarSite *templ = poleSites[poleId-1];
01044                 PolarSite *newSite = top->AddPolarSite(name);
01045                 newSite->ImportFrom(templ);
01046                 seg->AddPolarSite(newSite);
01047                 frag->AddPolarSite(newSite);
01048 
01049                 // Shift + rotate
01050                 if (!map2md) {
01051                     newSite->Translate(frag->getTransQM2MD());
01052                     newSite->Rotate(frag->getRotQM2MD(), frag->getCoMD());
01053                 }
01054                 else {
01055                     vec mdpos = frag->Atoms()[i]->getPos();
01056                     newSite->setPos(mdpos);
01057                     if (newSite->getRank() > 0) {
01058                         cout << endl << "ERROR: MAP2MD = TRUE "
01059                         " prevents use of higher-rank multipoles. " << endl;
01060                         throw runtime_error("User not paying attention. ");
01061                     }
01062                 }
01063             }
01064         }
01065     }
01066 
01067     top->setIsEStatified(true);
01068 
01069 }
01070 
01071 
01078 bool XMultipole::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
01079 
01080     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
01081     // Ridigidfy + Estatify //
01082     // ++++++++++++++++++++ //
01083 
01084     // Rigidify if (a) not rigid yet (b) rigidification at all possible
01085     if (!top->isRigid()) {
01086         bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
01087         if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
01088     }
01089     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already rigidified."; }
01090 
01091     // Forward multipoles to topology
01092     if (top->isEStatified() == false) {
01093         this->DistributeMpoles(top);
01094         cout << endl << "... ... Created " << top->PolarSites().size()
01095                  << " multipole sites." << flush;
01096     }
01097     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already estatified."; }
01098 
01099     if (_checkPolesPDB != "") {
01100         cout << endl << "... ... Writing polar-site coordinates to "
01101              << _checkPolesPDB << ". " << flush;
01102         // To check rotation into global frame
01103         string mpNAME = _checkPolesPDB;
01104         FILE *mpPDB = NULL;
01105         mpPDB = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
01106         vector<Segment*>::iterator sit;
01107         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
01108              sit < top->Segments().end();
01109              ++sit) {
01110             (*sit)->WritePDB(mpPDB, "Multipoles", "MD");
01111         }
01112         fclose(mpPDB);
01113     }
01114 
01115 
01116     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01117     // Create + start threads (Site Ops) //
01118     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01119 
01120     vector<SiteOpMultipole*> siteOps;
01121 
01122     _nextSite = top->Segments().begin();
01123 
01124     // Forward to first segment specified in options
01125     for ( ; (*_nextSite)->getId() != this->_firstSeg &&
01126               _nextSite < top->Segments().end(); ++_nextSite) { ; }
01127 
01128     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01129         SiteOpMultipole *newOp = new SiteOpMultipole(id, top, this);
01130         siteOps.push_back(newOp);
01131     }
01132 
01133     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01134         siteOps[id]->InitSlotData(top);
01135     }
01136 
01137     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01138         siteOps[id]->Start();
01139     }
01140 
01141     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01142         siteOps[id]->WaitDone();
01143     }
01144 
01145     for (int id = 0; id < _nThreads; id++) {
01146         delete siteOps[id];
01147     }
01148 
01149     siteOps.clear();
01150 
01151 
01152     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
01153     // Print numbers to file //
01154     // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
01155 
01156     if (_energies2File) {
01157 
01158         FILE *out;
01159         string topOutFile = "Frame"
01160                           + boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
01161                           + "_" + _outFile;
01162         out = fopen(topOutFile.c_str(), "w");
01163 
01164         vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
01165         for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
01166              sit < top->Segments().end();
01167              ++sit) {
01168 
01169             if ((*sit)->getId() < _firstSeg ) { continue; }
01170 
01171             fprintf(out, "%4d ", (*sit)->getId() );
01172             fprintf(out, "%4s ", (*sit)->getName().c_str() );
01173 
01174             // Energies
01175             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(0)) {
01176                 fprintf(out, "   0 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(0) );
01177             }
01178             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(-1)) {
01179                 fprintf(out, "  -1 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(-1) );
01180             }
01181 
01182             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(+1)) {
01183                 fprintf(out, "  +1 %3.8f   ", (*sit)->getEMpoles(+1) );
01184             }
01185 
01186             // Iterations
01187             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(0)) {
01188                 fprintf(out, "   0 %3d   ", _log_seg_iter[(*sit)->getId()][1]);
01189             }
01190             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(-1)) {
01191                 fprintf(out, "  -1 %3d   ", _log_seg_iter[(*sit)->getId()][0]);
01192             }
01193 
01194             if ((*sit)->hasChrgState(+1)) {
01195                 fprintf(out, "  +1 %3d   ", _log_seg_iter[(*sit)->getId()][2]);
01196             }
01197 
01198             // Polarizable sphere
01199             fprintf(out, "   SPH %4d   ",
01200                     _log_seg_sphereSize[(*sit)->getId()]);
01201 
01202             fprintf(out, "   %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f   ",
01203                     _log_seg_com[(*sit)->getId()].getX(),
01204                     _log_seg_com[(*sit)->getId()].getY(),
01205                     _log_seg_com[(*sit)->getId()].getZ());
01206 
01207             fprintf(out, " \n");
01208 
01209             if ( (*sit)->getId() == _lastSeg ) { break; }
01210         }
01211     }
01212 
01213     return 1;
01214 }
01215 
01216 
01217 // +++++++++++++++++ //
01218 // Thread Management //
01219 // +++++++++++++++++ //
01220 
01221 
01226 Segment *XMultipole::RequestNextSite(int opId, Topology *top) {
01227 
01228     _nextSiteMutex.Lock();
01229 
01230     Segment *workOnThis;
01231 
01232     if (_nextSite == top->Segments().end()) {
01233         workOnThis = NULL;
01234     }
01235     else if ((*_nextSite)->getId() > _lastSeg && _lastSeg > 0) {
01236         workOnThis = NULL;
01237     }
01238     else {
01239         workOnThis = *_nextSite;
01240         _nextSite++;
01241         cout << endl << "... ... OP " << opId
01242              << " evaluating energy for site "
01243              << workOnThis->getId() << flush;
01244     }
01245 
01246     _nextSiteMutex.Unlock();
01247 
01248     return workOnThis;
01249 }
01250 
01251 
01252 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01253 // SiteOperator Member Functions //
01254 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01255 
01256 void XMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Run(void) {
01257 
01258     while (true) {
01259 
01260         _seg = _master->RequestNextSite(_id, _top);
01261 
01262         if (_seg == NULL) { break; }
01263         else { this->EvalSite(_top, _seg); }
01264     }
01265 }
01266 
01267 
01272 void XMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::InitSlotData(Topology *top) {
01273 
01274 
01275     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sitRef;
01276     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sitNew;
01277     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitRef;
01278     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pitNew;
01279 
01280     _polarSites.resize(top->Segments().size());
01281     assert(top->Segments().size() == _polarSites.size());
01282 
01283     for (sitRef = top->Segments().begin(), sitNew = _polarSites.begin();
01284          sitRef < top->Segments().end();
01285          ++sitRef, ++sitNew) {
01286 
01287         (*sitNew).resize((*sitRef)->PolarSites().size());
01288 
01289         for (pitRef = (*sitRef)->PolarSites().begin(),
01290              pitNew = (*sitNew).begin();
01291              pitRef < (*sitRef)->PolarSites().end();
01292              ++pitRef, ++ pitNew) {
01293 
01294             *pitNew = new PolarSite();
01295             (*pitNew)->ImportFrom(*pitRef, "full");
01296             (*pitNew)->Charge(0);
01297         }
01298     }
01299 }
01300 
01301 
01305 XMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::~SiteOpMultipole() {
01306 
01307     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
01308     vector<PolarSite*> ::iterator pol;
01309 
01310     for (sit = _polarSites.begin(); sit < _polarSites.end(); ++sit) {
01311         for (pol = (*sit).begin(); pol < (*sit).end(); ++pol) {
01312             delete *pol;
01313         }
01314         (*sit).clear();
01315     }
01316     _polarSites.clear();
01317 }
01318 
01319 
01326 void XMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::EvalSite(Topology *top, Segment *seg) {
01327 
01328     double int2eV = 1/(4*M_PI*8.854187817e-12) * 1.602176487e-19 / 1.000e-9;
01329 
01330     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01331     // Define polarization sphere //
01332     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01333 
01334     this->_segsPolSphere.clear(); // <- Segments    within cutoff
01335     this->_segsOutSphere.clear(); // <- Segments    within cutoff1, cutoff2
01336     this->_polsPolSphere.clear(); // <- Polar sites within cutoff
01337     this->_polsOutSphere.clear(); // <- Polar sites within cutoff1, cutoff2
01338 
01339     vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
01340     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); sit < top->Segments().end(); ++sit) {
01341 
01342         double r12 = abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*sit)->getPos(),
01343                                                     seg->getPos()));
01344 
01345         if      ( r12 > _master->_cutoff2) { continue; }
01346 
01347         else if ( r12 > _master->_cutoff ) {
01348             _segsOutSphere.push_back(*sit);
01349             _polsOutSphere.push_back( _polarSites[(*sit)->getId() - 1] );
01350         }
01351         else {
01352             _segsPolSphere.push_back(*sit);
01353             _polsPolSphere.push_back( _polarSites[(*sit)->getId() - 1] );
01354         }
01355     }
01356 
01357 
01358 //    FILE *out;
01359 //    string shellFile = "OuterShell.pdb";
01360 //    out = fopen(shellFile.c_str(), "w");
01361 //    for (sit = _segsOutSphere.begin(); sit < _segsOutSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01362 //        (*sit)->WritePDB(out, "Multipoles", "");
01363 //    }
01364 //    fclose(out);
01365 
01366 
01367 
01368     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01369     // Investigate charge states //
01370     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01371 
01372     if (_master->_maverick) {
01373         cout << endl
01374              << "... ... ... Segments in polarization sphere: "
01375              << _segsPolSphere.size()
01376              << "; segments in static shell: "
01377              << _segsOutSphere.size()
01378              << flush;
01379     }
01380 
01381     this->Depolarize();
01382 
01383     // Make sure, outer shell also depolarized, according to strategy
01384     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
01385     vector<PolarSite*> ::iterator pit;
01386     for (sit1 = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
01387         for (pit = (*sit1).begin(); pit < (*sit1).end(); ++pit) {
01388             (*pit)->Depolarize();
01389         }
01390     }
01391 
01392     // Keep track of number of iterations needed until converged
01393     vector<int> iters;
01394     iters.resize(3);
01395 
01396     int state = 0;
01397     if (_seg->hasChrgState(state)) {
01398 
01399         if (_master->_maverick) {
01400             cout << endl << "... ... ... Seg " << seg->getId()
01401                          << " Charge " << state << flush;
01402         }
01403 
01404         this->Charge(state);
01405         int iter = 0;
01406         if (_master->_induce) iter = this->Induce(state);
01407         double EState = 0.0;
01408         if (_master->_induce) EState = this->Energy(state);
01409         else                 EState = this->EnergyStatic(state);
01410         _seg->setEMpoles(state, int2eV * EState);
01411         iters[state+1] = iter;
01412 
01413 
01414 
01415 //        FILE *out;
01416 //        string toFile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(_seg->getId())
01417 //                      + "_R_absU_N.dat";
01418 //        out = fopen(toFile.c_str(), "w");
01419 //        vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01420 //        vector< vector< PolarSite* > > ::iterator sit;
01421 //        vec CoM = _seg->getPos();
01422 //        for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01423 //            for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
01424 //                vec r  = _top->PbShortestConnect((*pit)->getPos(), CoM);
01425 //                int segId = (*pit)->getSegment()->getId();
01426 //                double R = abs(r);
01427 //                vec u = vec( (*pit)->U1x, (*pit)->U1y, (*pit)->U1z );
01428 //                // double U = abs(u);
01429 //                fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f  %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4d\n",
01430 //                              R, r.getX(), r.getY(), r.getZ(), u.getX(), u.getY(), u.getZ(), segId);
01431 //            }
01432 //        }
01433 //        fclose(out);
01434 
01435 
01436 //        // For visual check of convergence
01437 //        string mpNAME = "seg1_cation.dat";
01438 //        FILE *mpDat = NULL;
01439 //        mpDat = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
01440 //        vector<PolarSite*>::iterator pit;
01441 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[0].begin();
01442 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[0].end();
01443 //             ++pit) {
01444 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
01445 //        }
01446 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[1].begin();
01447 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[1].end();
01448 //             ++pit) {
01449 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
01450 //        }
01451 //        fclose(mpDat);
01452 
01453         // this->Depolarize(); // OVERRIDE
01454         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
01455         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
01456         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
01457             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01458                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
01459                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldP();
01460                 (*pit1)->ResetU1Hist();
01461             }
01462         }
01463     }
01464 
01465     state = -1;
01466     if (_seg->hasChrgState(state)) {
01467 
01468         if (_master->_maverick) {
01469             cout << endl << "... ... ... Seg " << seg->getId()
01470                          << " Charge " << state << flush;
01471         }
01472 
01473         this->Charge(state);
01474         int iter = 0;
01475         if (_master->_induce) iter = this->Induce(state);
01476         double EState = 0.0;
01477         if (_master->_induce) EState = this->Energy(state);
01478         else                 EState = this->EnergyStatic(state);
01479         _seg->setEMpoles(state, int2eV * EState);
01480         iters[state+1] = iter;
01481 
01482         /*
01483         // For visual check of convergence
01484         string mpNAME = "seg1_cation.dat";
01485         FILE *mpDat = NULL;
01486         mpDat = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
01487         vector<PolarSite*>::iterator pit;
01488         for (pit = _polsPolSphere[0].begin();
01489              pit < _polsPolSphere[0].end();
01490              ++pit) {
01491             (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
01492         }
01493         fclose(mpDat);
01494         */
01495 
01496         // this->Depolarize(); // OVERRIDE
01497         vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
01498         vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
01499         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
01500             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01501                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
01502                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldP();
01503                 (*pit1)->ResetU1Hist();
01504             }
01505         }
01506     }
01507 
01508     state = +1;
01509     if (_seg->hasChrgState(state)) {
01510 
01511         if (_master->_maverick) {
01512             cout << endl << "... ... ... Seg " << seg->getId()
01513                          << " Charge " << state << flush;
01514         }
01515 
01516         this->Charge(state);
01517         int iter = 0;
01518         if (_master->_induce) iter = this->Induce(state);
01519         double EState = 0.0;
01520         if (_master->_induce) EState = this->Energy(state);
01521         else                 EState = this->EnergyStatic(state);
01522         _seg->setEMpoles(state, int2eV * EState);
01523         iters[state+1] = iter;
01524 
01525 
01526 
01527 //        FILE *out;
01528 //        string toFile = boost::lexical_cast<string>(_seg->getId())
01529 //                      + "_R_absU_C.dat";
01530 //        out = fopen(toFile.c_str(), "w");
01531 //        vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01532 //        vector< vector< PolarSite* > > ::iterator sit;
01533 //        vec CoM = _seg->getPos();
01534 //        for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01535 //            for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
01536 //                vec r  = _top->PbShortestConnect((*pit)->getPos(), CoM);
01537 //                int segId = (*pit)->getSegment()->getId();
01538 //                double R = abs(r);
01539 //                vec u = vec( (*pit)->U1x, (*pit)->U1y, (*pit)->U1z );
01540 //                // double U = abs(u);
01541 //                fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f  %4.7f %4.7f %4.7f %4d \n",
01542 //                              R, r.getX(), r.getY(), r.getZ(), u.getX(), u.getY(), u.getZ(), segId);
01543 //            }
01544 //        }
01545 //        fclose(out);
01546 
01547 
01548 //        // For visual check of convergence
01549 //        string mpNAME = "seg1_neutral.dat";
01550 //        FILE *mpDat = NULL;
01551 //        mpDat = fopen(mpNAME.c_str(), "w");
01552 //        vector<PolarSite*>::iterator pit;
01553 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[0].begin();
01554 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[0].end();
01555 //             ++pit) {
01556 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
01557 //        }
01558 //        for (pit = _polsPolSphere[1].begin();
01559 //             pit < _polsPolSphere[1].end();
01560 //             ++pit) {
01561 //            (*pit)->PrintInfoVisual(mpDat);
01562 //        }
01563 //        fclose(mpDat);
01564 
01565 
01566         this->Depolarize();
01567 
01568     }
01569 
01570     this->_master->_logMutex.Lock();
01571     _master->_log_seg_iter[_seg->getId()] = iters;
01572     _master->_log_seg_sphereSize[_seg->getId()] = _polsPolSphere.size();
01573     _master->_log_seg_com[_seg->getId()] = _seg->getPos();
01574     this->_master->_logMutex.Unlock();
01575 
01576     this->Charge(0);
01577 
01578 }
01579 
01580 
01585 void XMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Charge(int state) {
01586 
01587     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01588     for (pit = _polarSites[_seg->getId()-1].begin();
01589          pit < _polarSites[_seg->getId()-1].end();
01590          ++pit) {
01591 
01592         (*pit)->Charge(state);
01593     }
01594 }
01595 
01596 
01600 int XMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Induce(int state) {
01601 
01602     double wSOR = (state == 0) ? _master->_wSOR_N : _master->_wSOR_C;
01603     double eTOL = this->_master->_epsTol;
01604     int    maxI = this->_master->_maxIter;
01605 
01606     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
01607     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
01608     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
01609     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
01610 
01611     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01612     // Inter-site fields (arising from perm. m'poles) //
01613     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01614 
01615 //    cout << endl << "... ... ... 0th-order field" << flush;
01616     for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
01617          sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01618          ++sit1) {
01619     for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
01620          sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01621          ++sit2) {
01622 
01623          for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01624          for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
01625 
01626              _actor.FieldPerm(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
01627          }}
01628     }}
01629 
01630     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
01631     // 1st-order induction //
01632     // +++++++++++++++++++ //
01633 
01634 //    cout << " | Induce " << endl;
01635     if (state == 0) { // OVERRIDE
01636         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
01637              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01638              ++sit1) {
01639 
01640              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01641                  (*pit1)->InduceDirect();
01642              }
01643         }
01644     }
01645 
01646 
01647 
01648     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01649     // Higher-order induction //
01650     // ++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01651 
01652     int iter = 0;
01653 //    boost::progress_timer T;
01654     for ( ; iter < maxI; ++iter) {
01655 
01656         // Reset fields FUx, FUy, FUz
01657 //        cout << "\r... ... ... Reset (" << iter << ")" << flush;
01658         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
01659              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01660              ++sit1) {
01661 
01662             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01663                 (*pit1)->ResetFieldU();
01664             }
01665         }
01666 
01667         // Intra-site contribution to induction field
01668 //        cout << " | Intra-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
01669         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
01670              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01671              ++sit1) {
01672 
01673             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01674             for (pit2 = pit1 + 1;        pit2 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit2) {
01675 
01676                 _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1),*(*pit2));
01677             }}
01678         }
01679 
01680         // Inter-site contribution to induction field
01681 //        cout << " | Inter-Site (" << iter << ")" << flush;
01682         //boost::progress_display show_progress( _polsPolSphere.size() );
01683 //        T.restart();
01684         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
01685              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01686              ++sit1) {
01687         for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;
01688              sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01689              ++sit2) {
01690 
01691             for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01692             for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
01693 
01694                 _actor.FieldIndu(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
01695             }}
01696         }}
01697 //        cout << " | dt " << T.elapsed() << flush;
01698 
01699         // Induce again
01700 //        cout << " | Induce (" << iter << ")" << flush;
01701         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
01702              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01703              ++sit1) {
01704 
01705              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01706                  (*pit1)->Induce(wSOR);
01707              }
01708         }
01709 
01710         // Check for convergence
01711 //        cout << " | Check (" << iter << ")" << flush;
01712         bool converged = true;
01713         double maxdU = -1;
01714         double avgdU = 0.0;
01715         int    baseN = 0;
01716         for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin();
01717              sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01718              ++sit1) {
01719 
01720              for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01721                  double dU = (*pit1)->HistdU();
01722                  avgdU += dU;
01723                  ++baseN;
01724                  if ( dU > maxdU ) { maxdU = dU; }
01725                  if ( dU > eTOL ) { converged = false; }
01726              }
01727         }
01728         avgdU /= baseN;
01729         if (avgdU < eTOL/10.) { converged = true; }
01730 
01731 //        cout << " | MAX dU " << maxdU
01732 //             << " | AVG dU " << avgdU
01733 //             << " | SOR " << wSOR << flush;
01734 
01735         // Break if converged
01736         if      (converged) {
01737             break;
01738         }
01739         else if (iter == maxI - 1) {
01740             this->_master->LockCout();
01741             cout << endl << "... ... ... WARNING Induced multipoles for site "
01742                  << _seg->getId() << " - state " << state
01743                  << " did not converge to precision: "
01744                  << " AVG dU:U " << avgdU << flush;
01745             this->_master->UnlockCout();
01746             break;
01747         }
01748     }
01749 
01750     return iter;
01751 
01752 //    cout << endl << "... ... ... State " << state
01753 //         << " - wSOR " << wSOR
01754 //         << " - Iterations " << iter << flush;
01755 }
01756 
01757 
01758 double XMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::EnergyStatic(int state) {
01759 
01760     _actor.ResetEnergy();
01761     double E_Tot = 0.0;
01762 
01763     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg1;
01764     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg2;
01765     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
01766     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
01767     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
01768     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
01769 
01770     vector< PolarSite* > central = _polarSites[ _seg->getId() - 1 ];
01771 
01772 
01773     for (seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin(); seg1 < _segsPolSphere.end(); ++seg1) {
01774 
01775         int id = (*seg1)->getId();
01776 
01777         if (id == _seg->getId()) {
01778             continue;
01779         }
01780 
01781         for (pit1 = _polarSites[id-1].begin();
01782              pit1 < _polarSites[id-1].end();
01783              ++pit1) {
01784         for (pit2 = central.begin();
01785              pit2 < central.end();
01786              ++pit2) {
01787 
01788              E_Tot += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
01789         }}
01790     }
01791 
01792     if (_master->_maverick) {
01793         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... E(" << state << ") = " << E_Tot
01794              << " = (P ~) " << _actor.getEP()
01795              << " + (U ~) " << _actor.getEU_INTER()
01796              << " + (U o) " << _actor.getEU_INTRA()
01797              << " , statics only. "
01798              << flush;
01799     }
01800 
01801     return E_Tot;
01802 }
01803 
01804 
01808 double XMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Energy(int state) {
01809 
01810     _actor.ResetEnergy();
01811     double E_Tot = 0.0;
01812 
01813     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg1;
01814     vector< Segment* > ::iterator seg2;
01815     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit1;
01816     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit2;
01817     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit1;
01818     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit2;
01819 
01820     // +++++++++++++++++ //
01821     // Inter-site energy //
01822     // +++++++++++++++++ //
01823 
01824     for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(), seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin();
01825          sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01826          ++sit1, ++seg1) {
01827     for (sit2 = sit1 + 1, seg2 = seg1 + 1;
01828          sit2 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01829          ++sit2, ++seg2) {
01830 
01831         //if ( abs(_top->PbShortestConnect((*seg1)->getPos(),_seg->getPos()))
01832         //        > _master->_cutoff) { throw runtime_error("Not this."); }
01833 
01834         //cout << "\r... ... Calculating interaction energy for pair "
01835         //     << (*seg1)->getId() << "|" << (*seg2)->getId() << "   " << flush;
01836 
01837 
01838         for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01839         for (pit2 = (*sit2).begin(); pit2 < (*sit2).end(); ++pit2) {
01840 
01841             //(*pit1)->PrintInfo(cout);
01842             //(*pit2)->PrintInfo(cout);
01843 
01844             E_Tot += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
01845 
01846         }}
01847     }}
01848 
01849     // +++++++++++++++++ //
01850     // Intra-site energy //
01851     // +++++++++++++++++ //
01852 
01853 //    // Not needed here
01854 //    for (sit1 = _polsPolSphere.begin(), seg1 = _segsPolSphere.begin();
01855 //         sit1 < _polsPolSphere.end();
01856 //         ++sit1, ++seg1) {
01857 //
01858 //        for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01859 //        for (pit2 = pit1 + 1; pit2 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit2) {
01860 //
01861 //            E_Tot += _actor.EnergyIntra(*(*pit1), *(*pit2)); // OVERRIDE
01862 //
01863 //        }}
01864 //    }
01865 
01866     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
01867     // Outer-Shell energy //
01868     // ++++++++++++++++++ //
01869 
01870     double E_Out = 0.0;
01871 
01872     vector< PolarSite* > central = _polarSites[ _seg->getId() - 1 ];
01873 
01874     for (sit1 = _polsOutSphere.begin(); sit1 < _polsOutSphere.end(); ++sit1) {
01875         for (pit1 = (*sit1).begin(); pit1 < (*sit1).end(); ++pit1) {
01876             for (pit2 = central.begin(); pit2 < central.end(); ++pit2) {
01877                 E_Out += _actor.EnergyInter(*(*pit1), *(*pit2));
01878             }
01879         }
01880     }
01881     E_Tot += E_Out;
01882 
01883 
01884     if (_master->_maverick) {
01885         cout << endl << "... ... ... ... E(" << state << ") = " << E_Tot
01886              << " = (P ~) " << _actor.getEP()
01887              << " + (U ~) " << _actor.getEU_INTER()
01888              << " + (U o) " << _actor.getEU_INTRA()
01889              << " , (O ~) " << E_Out
01890              << flush;
01891     }
01892 
01893     return E_Tot;
01894 }
01895 
01896 
01901 void XMultipole::SiteOpMultipole::Depolarize() {
01902 
01903     vector< vector<PolarSite*> > ::iterator sit;
01904     vector< PolarSite* > ::iterator pit;
01905 
01906     for (sit = _polsPolSphere.begin(); sit < _polsPolSphere.end(); ++sit) {
01907         for (pit = (*sit).begin(); pit < (*sit).end(); ++pit) {
01908 
01909             (*pit)->Depolarize();
01910         }
01911     }
01912 }
01913 
01914 
01915 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01916 // XInteractor Member Functions //
01917 // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
01918 
01922 inline double XMultipole::XInteractor::PotentialPerm(vec r,
01923                                                      PolarSite &pol) {
01924 
01925     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
01926     e12  = pol.getPos() - r;
01927     R    = 1/abs(e12);
01928     R2   = R*R;
01929     R3   = R2*R;
01930     R4   = R3*R;
01931     R5   = R4*R;
01932     e12 *= R;
01933 
01934 
01935 
01936 
01937     rbx = - pol._locX * e12;
01938     rby = - pol._locY * e12;
01939     rbz = - pol._locZ * e12;
01940 
01941     double phi00 = 0.0;
01942 
01943         phi00 += T00_00() * pol.Q00;
01944 
01945     if (pol._rank > 0) {
01946         phi00 += T00_1x() * pol.Q1x;
01947         phi00 += T00_1y() * pol.Q1y;
01948         phi00 += T00_1z() * pol.Q1z;
01949     }
01950 
01951     if (pol._rank > 1) {
01952         phi00 += T00_20()  * pol.Q20;
01953         phi00 += T00_21c() * pol.Q21c;
01954         phi00 += T00_21s() * pol.Q21s;
01955         phi00 += T00_22c() * pol.Q22c;
01956         phi00 += T00_22s() * pol.Q22s;
01957     }
01958 
01959     return phi00;
01960 }
01961 
01965 inline vec XMultipole::XInteractor::FieldPermESF(vec r,
01966                                                  PolarSite &pol) {
01967     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
01968     e12  = pol.getPos() - r;
01969     R    = 1/abs(e12);
01970     R2   = R*R;
01971     R3   = R2*R;
01972     R4   = R3*R;
01973     R5   = R4*R;
01974     e12 *= R;
01975 
01976         rax = e12.getX();
01977         ray = e12.getY();
01978         raz = e12.getZ();
01979         rbx = - rax;
01980         rby = - ray;
01981         rbz = - raz;
01982 
01983         cxx = 1;
01984         cxy = 0;
01985         cxz = 0;
01986         cyx = 0;
01987         cyy = 1;
01988         cyz = 0;
01989         czx = 0;
01990         czy = 0;
01991         czz = 1;
01992 
01993     double Fx = 0.0;
01994     double Fy = 0.0;
01995     double Fz = 0.0;
01996 
01997     // Field generated by rank-0 m'pole
01998         Fx += T1x_00() * pol.Q00;
01999         Fy += T1y_00() * pol.Q00;
02000         Fz += T1z_00() * pol.Q00;
02001 
02002     // Field generated by rank-1 m'pole
02003     if (pol._rank > 0) {
02004         Fx += T1x_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02005         Fx += T1x_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02006         Fx += T1x_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02007 
02008         Fy += T1y_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02009         Fy += T1y_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02010         Fy += T1y_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02011 
02012         Fz += T1z_1x() * pol.Q1x;
02013         Fz += T1z_1y() * pol.Q1y;
02014         Fz += T1z_1z() * pol.Q1z;
02015     }
02016 
02017     // Field generated by rank-2 m'pole
02018     if (pol._rank > 1) {
02019         Fx += T1x_20()  * pol.Q20;
02020         Fx += T1x_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02021         Fx += T1x_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02022         Fx += T1x_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02023         Fx += T1x_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02024 
02025         Fy += T1y_20()  * pol.Q20;
02026         Fy += T1y_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02027         Fy += T1y_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02028         Fy += T1y_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02029         Fy += T1y_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02030 
02031         Fz += T1z_20()  * pol.Q20;
02032         Fz += T1z_21c() * pol.Q21c;
02033         Fz += T1z_21s() * pol.Q21s;
02034         Fz += T1z_22c() * pol.Q22c;
02035         Fz += T1z_22s() * pol.Q22s;
02036     }
02037 
02038     return vec(Fx, Fy, Fz);
02039 }
02040 
02044 inline void XMultipole::XInteractor::FieldInduAlpha(PolarSite &pol1,
02045                                                     PolarSite &pol2) {
02046     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02047     e12  = pol2.getPos() - pol1.getPos();
02048     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02049     R2   = R*R;
02050     R3   = R2*R;
02051     R4   = R3*R;
02052     R5   = R4*R;
02053     e12 *= R;
02054 
02055     // Thole damping init.
02056     a    = _em->_aDamp;
02057     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
02058 
02059 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
02060 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
02061 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
02062 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
02063 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
02064 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
02065 
02066         rax = e12.getX();
02067         ray = e12.getY();
02068         raz = e12.getZ();
02069         rbx = - rax;
02070         rby = - ray;
02071         rbz = - raz;
02072 
02073 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
02074 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
02075 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
02076 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
02077 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
02078 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
02079 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
02080 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
02081 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
02082 
02083         cxx = 1;
02084         cxy = 0;
02085         cxz = 0;
02086         cyx = 0;
02087         cyy = 1;
02088         cyz = 0;
02089         czx = 0;
02090         czy = 0;
02091         czz = 1;
02092 
02093     // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
02094 
02095     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02096         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02097         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02098         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02099         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02100         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02101         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02102         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02103         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02104         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02105 
02106         pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02107         pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02108         pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02109         pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
02110         pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
02111         pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
02112         pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
02113         pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
02114         pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
02115     }
02116     else {
02117         pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02118         pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02119         pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02120         pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02121         pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02122         pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02123         pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02124         pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02125         pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02126 
02127         pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02128         pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02129         pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02130         pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
02131         pol2.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
02132         pol2.FUy += T1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
02133         pol2.FUz += T1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
02134         pol2.FUz += T1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
02135         pol2.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
02136     }
02137 }
02138 
02142 inline void XMultipole::XInteractor::FieldIndu(PolarSite &pol1,
02143                                                PolarSite &pol2) {
02144 
02145     // NOTE >>> e12 points from polar site 1 to polar site 2 <<< NOTE //
02146     //          This implies that induced = - alpha * field
02147     e12  = _top->PbShortestConnect(pol1.getPos(), pol2.getPos());
02148     R    = 1/abs(e12);
02149     R2   = R*R;
02150     R3   = R2*R;
02151     R4   = R3*R;
02152     R5   = R4*R;
02153     e12 *= R;
02154 
02155     // Thole damping init.
02156     a    = _em->_aDamp;
02157     u3   = 1 / (R3 * sqrt(pol1.P1 * pol2.P1));
02158 
02159 //        rax =   pol1._locX * e12;
02160 //        ray =   pol1._locY * e12;
02161 //        raz =   pol1._locZ * e12;
02162 //        rbx = - pol2._locX * e12;
02163 //        rby = - pol2._locY * e12;
02164 //        rbz = - pol2._locZ * e12;
02165 
02166         rax = e12.getX();
02167         ray = e12.getY();
02168         raz = e12.getZ();
02169         rbx = - rax;
02170         rby = - ray;
02171         rbz = - raz;
02172 
02173 //        cxx = pol1._locX * pol2._locX;
02174 //        cxy = pol1._locX * pol2._locY;
02175 //        cxz = pol1._locX * pol2._locZ;
02176 //        cyx = pol1._locY * pol2._locX;
02177 //        cyy = pol1._locY * pol2._locY;
02178 //        cyz = pol1._locY * pol2._locZ;
02179 //        czx = pol1._locZ * pol2._locX;
02180 //        czy = pol1._locZ * pol2._locY;
02181 //        czz = pol1._locZ * pol2._locZ;
02182 
02183         cxx = 1;
02184         cxy = 0;
02185         cxz = 0;
02186         cyx = 0;
02187         cyy = 1;
02188         cyz = 0;
02189         czx = 0;
02190         czy = 0;
02191         czz = 1;
02192 
02193     // Fields generated by rank-1 induced m'poles
02194 
02195     if (a*u3 < 40.0) {
02196         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02197         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02198         pol1.FUx += TU1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02199         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02200         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02201         pol1.FUy += TU1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02202         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02203         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02204         pol1.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02205 
02206         pol2.FUx += TU1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02207         pol2.FUx += TU1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02208         pol2.FUx += TU1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02209         pol2.FUy += TU1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
02210         pol2.FUy += TU1y_1y() * pol1.U1y;
02211         pol2.FUy += TU1z_1y() * pol1.U1z;
02212         pol2.FUz += TU1x_1z() * pol1.U1x;
02213         pol2.FUz += TU1y_1z() * pol1.U1y;
02214         pol2.FUz += TU1z_1z() * pol1.U1z;
02215     }
02216     else {
02217         pol1.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02218         pol1.FUx += T1x_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02219         pol1.FUx += T1x_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02220         pol1.FUy += T1y_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02221         pol1.FUy += T1y_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02222         pol1.FUy += T1y_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02223         pol1.FUz += T1z_1x() * pol2.U1x;
02224         pol1.FUz += T1z_1y() * pol2.U1y;
02225         pol1.FUz += T1z_1z() * pol2.U1z;
02226 
02227         pol2.FUx += T1x_1x() * pol1.U1x;
02228         pol2.FUx += T1y_1x() * pol1.U1y;
02229         pol2.FUx += T1z_1x() * pol1.U1z;
02230         pol2.FUy += T1x_1y() * pol1.U1x;
